description:
Designed to make skiing fun and easy, so little kids take to the sport from the get-go. The short and wide shape helps them balance and builds confidence. A gentle sidecut gives them nice glide for a bigger woohoo factor too.

  • Durable bindings secure with buckles and are designed to fit most winter boots
  • Waxless bases provide some grip on uphills, but try duct-taping a short (15-20cm) piece of climbing skin under the binding to enhance climbing and braking performance in hillier terrain
  • Recommended for kids up to 25kg
name: Madshus Snow Pup Skis - Children to Youths
